name: vivo X300 Ultra
highlights:
Not announced yet

Android 16, OriginOS 6
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front, glass back, aluminum frame
BODY: IP69/IP68 dust tight and water resistant (immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, PWM, Dolby Vision, HDR Vivid

PLATFORM.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
200 MP, (wide), 1/1.12", 0.7µm, PDAF, gimbal OIS
200 MP, f/2.3, 85mm (periscope telephoto), 1/1.4", 0.56µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS, 3.7x optical zoom, macro 3.4:1
(optional add-on zoom lens: f/2.3, 200mm, 2.35x optical zoom, Zeiss optics)
50 MP, f/2.0, 14mm, 116˚ (ultrawide), 1/1.28", 1.22µm, dual pixel PDAF, OIS
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, color spectrum sensor, Zeiss optics, Zeiss T* lens coating, LED flash, panorama, HDR, 3D LUT import
MAIN CAMERA.Video: 8K@30fps, 4K@30/60/120fps, 1080p@30/60/120/240fps, gyro-EIS, Dolby Vision HDR, 10-bit Log, HDR10+

COMMS.Bluetooth: 5.4, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, aptX Lossless, LHDC 5

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
FEATURES: Emergency SOS via satellite (calls, messages) - 16GB + 1TB model only

BATTERY.Charging:
100W wired, PD, PPS, QC, UFCS
40W wireless
Reverse wired
Reverse wireless
